trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_SEQ_00<tab>Estinien would know the origin of Nidhogg's mysterious eye.

TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_SEQ_01<tab>It would seem that Estinien cannot rest until he has prised the truth from Hraesvelgr─and he would have Lady Iceheart present to hear the final chapter of the tale. Travel to Zenith in the Churning Mists and seek out Ysayle.

TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_SEQ_02<tab>You rejoin Ysayle at Zenith, and once more sound the horn to summon Hraesvelgr. As before, the great wyrm's presence stirs the dormant power of the Echo, and you are visited with a vision from a thousand years past. In the scene which unfolds before you, Hraesvelgr surrenders an eye to his vengeful brood-brother, condemning the people of Ishgard to an eternity of suffering... At last, you know the truth of the Dragonsong War's beginnings.
TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_ESTINIEN_000_000<tab>With Nidhogg fallen, none save Hraesvelgr remains to answer our questions. Let us trouble the wyrm again.
TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_ESTINIEN_000_001<tab>And if Iceheart yet lingers at Zenith, all the better. I would have her hear the truth from the dragon's maw.
TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_ESTINIEN_000_002<tab>...She has scarce moved since last we parted. Hmph. Hraesvelgr's confession will soon shake her from her stupor.
TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_ICEHEART_000_010<tab>'Twas you, was it not? The furious screams of the dragons carried far...
TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_ICEHEART_000_011<tab>You have slain Nidhogg─what more could you desire from this place? Will you not allow Hraesvelgr to mourn the death of his kin in peace!?

TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_ESTINIEN_000_012<tab>Spare us your sanctimonious judgment, ice maiden. We have a <var 1A 02 /var>gift<var 1A 01 /var> for the great wyrm...and a mystery that can no longer lie buried.

TEXT_HEAVNA334_01635_ESTINIEN_000_013<tab>Lady Iceheart─the Dragonsong War has all but consumed your life and claimed many of your followers. 'Tis time you learned the truth of its beginning─the <var 1A 02 /var>whole<var 1A 01 /var> truth─that we may at last bring this bitter conflict to an end.
